title: The Pirates Next Door
overview: A small town's quiet life is suddenly turned upside down by the arrival of a family of pirates! For Matilda, her new neighbors are a dream come true! With Jim Lad, the Jolley-Rogers' son, around, there's no chance of getting bored. Despite their differences, these best friends get into all sorts of trouble shaking up the town residents and turning every day into a new adventure.
